title: Samson and Delilah
summary: Judges 16 tells of Samson's downfall. He falls in love with Delilah, who is bribed by the Philistines. After several failed attempts, she gets him to reveal the secret of his strength—his uncut hair. The Philistines capture and blind him, but in the end, Samson brings down the temple by pushing its pillars, killing himself and many Philistines.

faq.question: How did Delilah discover Samson’s secret?
faq.answer: She pressed him daily until he revealed that his strength came from his Nazirite hair.

faq.question: How did Samson die?
faq.answer: He pushed down the pillars of the Philistine temple, killing himself and many others.
